text: 8|24|He muminasakala! Raachule yetiya tomalokaka ene kibara prati ahbana karae yitorae tomalokaka jirana dana karaiba, tetiya tomaloke allaha arau te'omra raachulara ahbanata samharai diba arau jani thoraa, niscaya allaha manuhara arau tara hrdayara majata antaraaya hai yaya. Niscaya te'omra pine'i tomalokaka ekatraita karaa haâ€™ba.
